segments.text: Hey John . I have some great news .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got a job offer from Dell .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I thought you said you didn't get the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought I did bad on the interview , but I guess I was wrong . I'm so happy right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet . That's great news . I'm very happy for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I feel like celebrating . Let's go have a beer . It's on me .
segments.speaker: S1
